attributes.action: REIMBURSE University Students for the final pay out of accommodation fees.
attributes.additional_details:
Which means that students have been advised to move out. Consequently resulting in many Universities closing for the remaining academic year.

Why should students have to acquire debt from our final accommodation fee, when many of us no longer live their under guidance from our University.

We pay for this from loans, personal savings and with help from our parents. Making us and those who help us financially vulnerable. 

Would you let £2000 get lost in the system? 

Students need support too.
attributes.background:
Students have ALREADY faced a lack of reliability from Universities whilst lecturers went on strike.

We are aware that Universities are doing all they can to protect us, but they could be doing more to help us.

Covid-19, is infecting the nation at speed..
